# Read Feature Set from CSV 
```{r}
OriginalCSV = readLines("AllFeatures.csv")
skipHeader = OriginalCSV[-c(1,2)]
AllVariables = read.csv(textConnection(skipHeader), header = FALSE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
DataFrame=AllVariables[,c(31,32,33,35,37,38,39,40,41,42,43,44,46,47,48,139,140,305,535)]
FeatureSet = DataFrame[,-c(19)]
AuthorSet = DataFrame[,c(19)]
```

#Scatter Plots of first 6 predictors

```{r}
plot(FeatureSet[1:6])
```

#Scatter Plots of next 6 predictors
```{r}
plot(FeatureSet[7:12])
```

#Scatter Plots of last 6 predictors
```{r}
plot(FeatureSet[12:18])
```
